hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah said:"I do not know that the Messenger of Allah recited the whole Quran in one night, or prayed Qiyam until morning, or ever fasted an entire month except Ramadan

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ أَلْفَاظِ النَّاقِلِينَ لِخَبَرِ عَائِشَةَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Different wordings used by those who reported the Narration of 'Aishah about that
